org.sensorhub.impl.service.wsn

Class InMemorySubscriptionDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<String,SubscriptionInfo>
        • org.sensorhub.impl.service.wsn.InMemorySubscriptionDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,SubscriptionInfo>, ISubscriptionDB

    public class InMemorySubscriptionDB
extends HashMap<String,SubscriptionInfo>
implements ISubscriptionDB

    Default implementation of subscription DB backed up by a hash map that is fully stored in memory.

    Since:
    Dec 12, 2014
    Author:
    Alex Robin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
